/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of greenery and architecture. Cars are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the busy nature of the area. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens used, adding a unique perspective to the scene.
